name: bb-better-binding
description: 1 way data binding from javascript controller to html template

scripts.dev-example: nodemon --watch example --watch src -e html,js --exec npm run build-example & http-server ./build/helloWorld -o -a localhost -c-1
scripts.build-example: [ -d build ] && rm -r build; cp -r example build; browserify --debug example/helloWorld/controller.js -o build/helloWorld/controller.js
scripts.build-docs: [ -d docs ] && rm -r docs; cp -r example/helloWorld docs; browserify --debug example/helloWorld/controller.js -o docs/controller.js
scripts.postversion: npm run build-docs && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: mahhov
